name: Cyberjunk VR
description:
Welcome to CyberJunk!

You wake up in an old shack on a junkyard, the owner nowhere to be seen. The only thing that's for certain, you have to get out of here and back home!

Objectives:
  • Find items in piles of trash
  • Craft new items together to clear obstacles in your way
  • Defeat the boss to open the exit of the junkyard
  • Have pizza to celebrate !

Short of the Flame Pipe ! If something stands in your way, shoot a fireball at it!

Install Instruction

PCVR: 

  • Download and extract CyberJunk VR.rar
  •  Start CyberJunk VR.exe. 
  • Enjoy!

Mobile requirements: 

  • - PC/MAC
  • - Oculus Quest or Oculus Quest 2
  • - APK from CyberJunk VR
  • - Sidequest for PC/MAC

1. Please download Sidequest to install the APK on your Quest 2. Please install the advanced installer (right side) for your operating system: https://sidequestvr.com/setup-howto 

2. you do not need to create an account. Launch Sidequest and connect your Quest to your PC/MAC via USB. In Sidequest, press the icon with the package in the tool menu at the top with an arrow pointing down.

3. In the dialog box that appears, select the CyberJunk VR APK to install the APK on the Quest.

4. Once the APK is installed, the app will be available in the Oculus Quest under Apps > Unknown Sources (top right dropdown).

Known Bugs
  •  The character controller seems a bit to high to pick up things from the ground. FIX: Run to a trash pile and pick a new item. 
  • While trying to grab a loaded Water Gun from the holster, its possible to just grab the magazine. FIX: Grab the gun with the other hand and re-assemble.  
  • Not a bug in that sense, but to exit please use alt+F4 or VR overlay menu to exit the application
Credits

This game was created in only 9 days for the VR Game Jam 2022 with the theme "One-Time Use" by the VR Jammies. A group of people whom met as strangers and left as friends.  

Build with a Quest 2 connected via Link Cable.

Assets
  • Unity XR Interaction Toolkit
  • VR Jam 2022 XR Controller Template
  • FMOD - Audio
  • Ground Texture4d ambientCG.com/a/Ground048 -
